definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Lithography is used commercially as well.
sentences.chinese: 平版印刷术在商业上也得以运用。

sentences.english: Shiuan paper (chinese writing painting paper), hand-made, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 手工制宣纸，未涂布，卷筒或平版。

sentences.english: General lithographic, gravure, flexo printing, and varnish process after printing.
sentences.chinese: 一般平版，凹版，凸版印刷及印后上光油加工。

sentences.english: Unbleached sack kraft paper, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 未漂白袋用牛皮纸，未涂布，卷筒或平版。

sentences.english: Litho-printed octagon icon stripe down front.
sentences.chinese: 平版印刷的八角形的图标条纹，向下前。

sentences.english: Imageable elements useful as lithographic printing plate precursors are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 公开了可用作平版印版前体的可成像元件。

sentences.english: Other sack kraft paper, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 其它袋用牛皮纸，未涂布，卷筒或平版。

sentences.english: These historic works of art will be released to the public as limited editions of signed lithographs.
sentences.chinese: 这些艺术历史作品是以有限的单一的平版版本发行。

sentences.english: The image is used as the negative planography printing plate printing.
sentences.chinese: 这样形成的图像被用来作为阴图平版印刷版印版。

sentences.english: A colorless reducer (magnesia in linseed oil) used to extend lithographic inks and lessen their color strength.
sentences.chinese: 中义减色剂，使平版油墨容易延展并降低色强度。

sentences.english: Rumors suggest that a new version of Apple's tablet computer could be out as early as September.
sentences.chinese: 据传新版的苹果平版电脑可能早在九月份上市。

sentences.english: Chemicals used in lithographic dampening solution in place of isopropyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 取代加在平版水槽液中异丙醇的化学物质。

sentences.english: Management or operation of a printing press.
sentences.chinese: 制作平版印刷品的艺术。

definition: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
color printing using several overlaid images
color printing using several overlaid images
